solution_line_template: The total number of girls in the choir is {initial_total_girls}+ {added_girls} = <<{initial_total_girls}+{added_girls}={total_girls_after_addition}>>{total_girls_after_addition} girls.

The total number of blondes in the choir after 10 more are added is {initial_blonde_girls}+{added_girls} = <<{initial_blonde_girls}+{added_girls}={total_blonde_girls}>>{total_blonde_girls} blonde-haired girls.

From the total number, the number of black-haired girls is {total_girls_after_addition}-{total_blonde_girls} = <<{total_girls_after_addition}-{total_blonde_girls}={black_haired_girls}>>{black_haired_girls} black-haired-girls
